solution_line_template: If Genevieve had ${genevieve_had_money} on her, and Clarice chipped in with ${clarice_chipped_in}, the total cost of the cherries was ${genevieve_had_money}+${clarice_chipped_in} = $<<{genevieve_had_money}+{clarice_chipped_in}={total_cost_cherries}>>{total_cost_cherries}
If the cherries cost ${cost_per_kilogram} per kilogram, Genevieve bought ${total_cost_cherries}/${cost_per_kilogram} = {kilograms_cherries} kilograms of cherry
